definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 14:10 tenth part (of ephah; cf. LXX de/katon tou= oi)fi/ Nu 15:4, and [[עֲשִׂירִית הָאֵיפָה]] Nu 28:5; i.e = [[עׂמֶר]], v. further Benz:Arch. 182 Now:Arch. i. 203);—abs;—´[[ע]] Le 14:21 +, [[עִשָּׂרׂן]] Ex 29:40, Nu 28:13; pl. [[עֶשְׂרׂנִים]] Nu 28:9 +;—only P (H), as measure of [[סׂלֶת]] used in meal-offering Ex 29:40, Le 14:10 + 3 t. Lv (H only Le 23:17); Nu 15:4 + 26 t. Nu, incl. distributive [[ן עִשָּׂרוֹן]] ([[וֹ]])[[עִשָּׂר ]] Nu 28:13 + 4 t.
